concept.shortdesc: The deprecated boolean element is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the state element.

conbody.p: The boolean element has been deprecated since DITA 1.0. It typically is used in topics, although the element also can appear as a child of ph in DITA maps.

section.title: DITA 1.3 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the boolean element is used in DITA 1.x releases.
section.codeblock: She said <boolean state="yes"/> when I asked her to marry me!

section.title: DITA 2.0 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the boolean element can be replaced by the state element in DITA 2.0.
section.codeblock: She said <state name="boolean" value="yes"/> when I asked her to marry me!
